column1: Traffic reports will resume Monday, February 6 at 7:00 am

column5: The inbound thru lane and right turn lane are blocked for water main repairs.

column4: UPDATE:  Rosemont Garden at Southland Dr / Lafayette Pkwy
column5: Intersection closed thru at least Monday 2/6 late night due to repairs on a 16" water main break and damaged communication lines.
